modName: Path of Sorcery - Undeath Immersive Lichdom Perktree patch
summary: This is a small patch for the perk tree between Path of Sorcery - Undeath Immersive Lichdom V3.
descriptionHtml:
Because I am using Path of Sorcery and Undeath Immersive Lichdom V3 together and I didn't find any patch for the perk tree I made this patch, hopefully it helps someone else also. For any bug's please let me know and will try to fix it.

For this to work you need:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68587/?]Path of Sorcery - Magic Perk Overhaul made by [b]steelfeathers[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40607/?]Undeath made by [b]Antioch08
[/b][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard made by [b]TMPhoenix[/b] [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60783/?]Undeath Immersive Lichdom V3 made by [b]Tx12001[/b] [/url]
author: minos55
